website_summaries.verdict: An attractive Bluetooth beanie that produces nice sound once you figure out how to sync it. A wide variety of colors and designs means you're likely to find one to fit your style.
pros: Available in numerous patterns, colors, and style variations, including one with an attractive brim
Sound quality emitted by the built-in headphones is impressive for both music and calls
Headphones can be removed to wash the hat
cons: Can be challenging to sync, and the lack of detailed instructions could mean a call to customer service

customer_reviews.title: They can actually hear you better than if using ear buds with a built in ...
customer_reviews.text: Beanie arrived quickly. It works as advertised. You can answer calls hands free. There is a built in microphone so you can talk on the phone hands free. The person on the other end can hear you loud and clear. They can actually hear you better than if using ear buds with a built in mic. Hat fits great and looks nice. The sound quality of the speakers is good. It's not BOSE quality obviously but it sounds good and other people close by can't really hear what you're listening to. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Easier To Charge Than Others
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a couple different headphone beanies, and this has been the best one! It’s tighter than I expected, but started to stretch with wear and it worked out. I’ve got piercings all up and down my ears and this beanie doesn’t press on them. The speakers/button panel are VERY easy to take out/put in, and the sound quality is on par with a nicer set of inexpensive headphones. The bass is richer than I expected and the treble isn’t tinny. I was expecting less and got more!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Menge

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. We had already purchased and returned two similar products because of poor sound quality and not fitting (too big). He really likes this one, though! says the sound quality is really good. It's good with music on his phone as well as streaming sites. It is still a little big, so if he pulls it all the way down on his head, the speakers are at his ear lobes, rather than directly on his ears. He also says it is very warm. It's easy to charge. I'll leave an updated review once we try removing the electronics and washing it.
customer_reviews.author: cnfox21

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.  Works well, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product . Hat is constructed of very nice material, fits well and the sound is pretty good. Really prefer wearing this hat to earbuds in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jul Mc

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, great sounding Bluetooth beanie.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to wear during the cold winters here in PA that would allow me to listen to music without having to have headphones stuffed under my hat. This hat performed fantastic.. I did have a bit of trouble the first time I tried to Bluetooth sync it to my phone (I'm 48 and not the most tech savvy) but once I got it done it was easy.. charge lasts a long time, hat itself is very comfortable and warm. The best part and perhaps most surprising thing was the sound quality. It is as good if not better than my headphones.. really clear sound.. Very impressed and happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: michael Kamens

customer_reviews.title: great idea for runners like me
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea. I run a lot and frequently lose my headphones or they get damaged. Now I get my beanie and music all in one product which is really convenient. The hat fits well Nd the Bluetooth pairing and easy and remains stable during my run and it sounds very decent. Good value for money and good innovation. Hat is not too tight just fits perfect and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: They actually work, I'm shocked!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband who is notoriously impossible to shop for. He asked for wireless Beats headphones to use when running, which I also got, but turns out he loves this and we returned the Beats after 2 weeks when they completely stopped working (likely shorted due to sweat). He said the sound is perfect, and he LOVES that he's got no wires at all and nothing in his ears. The style is basic and versatile, somewhere between a tight scull cap and a beanie that's got a little more room at the top.
customer_reviews.author: ShebakesNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great beanie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son He has used it for 3 ski trips this year and still going strong. Looks great and no issues with connection, sound or fit. He usually wears a size XL in helmets and hats on top of that he has a lot of curly hair, this beanie had a good stretch and fit well over his head
customer_reviews.author: Robin K

customer_reviews.title: Soft. High Quality sound. Made my life better
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 5 stars because I love it. The only downside is that I have a BIG head and the speakers on it don't really match up with my ears. The reason I gave it 5 stars is because it is not the companies fault that I have a big head. I do recommend this to anyone who enjoys music with excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Generation_Z

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound But Speakers Not Sewed in Place
customer_reviews.text: I liked how these headphones sounded and how the beanie looked but the speakers weren't connected well and you had to push them around inside the beanie to get them to line up with your ears. I've bought two others and this doesn't seem standard. It was also unusually hard to find the charging slot.
customer_reviews.author: Laramie Flick

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quality. However if you don't have a small head don't get the hats with the "slouch" get the ones that are form fitting against the head because it will stick straight up and looks funny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound .
customer_reviews.text: Greeeat beanie , not paper thin fabric , thick but not too thick like a comfy boot sock . Warm , I wear it to jog . Connects to my LG V20 with no problem . Sounds awesome . Battery charge seems to last forever ...at least on a one to two hour workout , it never quits . Love this thing .
customer_reviews.author: John Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Hat is nice, speakers bad.
customer_reviews.text: The hat is nice, but the speaker quality is awful. They sound like a $2 dollar store speaker. Also, the right speaker is louder than the left and I can't adjust the balance (Yes it's the speaker and not my ears, I've put it on either side).
customer_reviews.author: Barnabas

customer_reviews.title: Be patient with pairing!!!
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty here. It was a little difficult to pair if you don't have an up-to-date phone but i do so i eventually got it. Overall the headphones definitely need to be raised up on them. The sound quality is terrific if you have the beanie lifted a little and headphones aligned with your ears. If you wear your beanie like that, of course. The comfort is great. Not too thick and not too thin. Its just little things. Like the box on the beanine in unnecessarily big. Come on tech world you can do better haha. With everything said and done this beanie is pretty nice for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Just my luck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift(purchased 4 total) only two have been opened so idk if the others work. Initially worked as it was supposed to but after second charge wouldn't connect/pair with any devices. Definately exchanging for a new one. Probably just received a faulty one. Otherwise it's an awesome product, hope the next one last longer than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Angelface

customer_reviews.title: Coolest hat I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great. If you like wearing beanies and use bluetooth headsets you've probably experiencrd how painful it can be to have your hat pushing them further into your ear; this hat completwly fixes that issue, while still being a comfortable and warm hat.
customer_reviews.author: SumimaSorry

customer_reviews.title: No charging cable included even though it says it will be.
customer_reviews.text: Came with no charging cable or tag on hat making me wonder if it was used. Using my own cable and will update review if I can pair with an iPhone 10.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need
customer_reviews.text: Worked great out of the box. Comes in a nice sleeve. Charged up quickly and connected to my droid with no problem. Cap is comfy and I wear it under my CPAP headgear because I listen to music to help me fall asleep. Good sound quality. Love the fact I don't strangle myself with a cord anymore. And the stand by time is great - alarm woke me up through the cap the next morning. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cigarman

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice beanie. A little different from what I thought it would look like but is warm and plays my music fine. Helps when shoveling the snow. Took a minute to get the Bluetooth to connect but am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased, so only used for a few days. Sound quality very good. Syncs perfectly with my android phone, no issues. Hat quality is good and has a way to take out electronics for cleaning. Charges easy.
customer_reviews.author: CCM

customer_reviews.title: meh, too small
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the size is very small. It is very uncomfortable to wear. Speakers are not very good and the controls are difficult.
customer_reviews.author: lwsmith

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Product.  Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Can get about 8 hours out of this product. Encellent! Ordered for my son. He works midnights. He loves it because it lasts his whole shift. He tried this product and another cheaper brand and he ended up ordering 2 more of this one. The other brand only lasted 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Larger fit than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but fit on some is a little large (I bought 4), and the hat is a little tall. Otherwise, everything works. The one with folding brim fit a little tighter, and therefore better.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenswold

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use, works good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my middle schooler, so he can listen to his music on the bus during the winter. It was very easy to pair with his phone, and super simple for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: moosmom

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat! Keeps my head warm and produces decent amount of sound so I can still hear my book/music if there is some ambient noise. Good battery life. Deducted one star because if I pause my music/book for too long (not exact on time, but less than 10 minutes), it powers off on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Benson

customer_reviews.title: Holding the correct button to turn off without seeing
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome! Only thing is that I struggle to turn it off because I’m never sure if I’m holding down the correct button without having to take it off of my head.
customer_reviews.author: ismael

customer_reviews.title: Sound goes in and out
customer_reviews.text: Hat wasn't really warm. I couldn't pull it over both ears because of how much hair I have. The sound went in and out. Battery dies super fast on standby but doesn't take long to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Must have then
customer_reviews.text: I adore these. They have become a must have product in my life. I have to listen to asmr to sleep and I also need to hear my alarm clock. These allow me to fall asleep fast, comfortably, and still not sleep through my alarm. I prefer the corded head phones because I always forget to charge my blue tooth ones...however my cat chewed through the cord so now I have to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Alannah

customer_reviews.title: Speaker stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother in law he said that at first it was awesome but slowly stopped working :/ he know just wears the beanie as a beanie but doesn’t mind it because it’s stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Jones

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought black, so i will buy the black one again, works great why black because black go with or white go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sand

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my uncle who spends most of the cold months skiing when he’s not working. So thought this would be perfect for when he is on the slopes! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: If you to set up fun to use And great sound
customer_reviews.text: Wow just charge it an attitude your phone and you ready to go and listen to music it's really stalish I get a lot of compliments on it and people always ask me work to piatt it's really cool highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: boris

customer_reviews.title: Gift for teenage nieces - they loved them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these (one purple, one black) for our two nieces for Christmas, and they loved these. They were so excited when they realized they could listen to their music while looking stylish.
customer_reviews.author: AustinGirlie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Sleeping (if it fits)
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. The fit was perfect, I looked cute, the sound quality was entirely acceptable. But I had to return it because the speaker placement didn't match my ears and they aren't moveable. Sad! I got the headband style that Rotibox offers and it's just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product while I take my dog for his walk and also while doing yard work and during my workouts. The controls are easy to access and easy to use. Nice crisp clean sound.
customer_reviews.author: michael e brooks

customer_reviews.title: Has great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I use this too much, even in places where I really shouldn't. Has great battery life. It's kind of a pain to wash, because it needs to be hand washed, but besides that, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: My head is a bit larger than average, so ...
customer_reviews.text: My head is a bit larger than average, so while the hat does the fit, only one speaker will be properly over my ear, the other sits half on half off my ear. I got interference with my headset when ever the wind would pick up past 7-8mph and it cut out a lot above 15mph. So this is basically usless when I want to go for a run in the winter unless it's a perfectly calm day.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson -thank u for such a great product - I got a compliment : Mawmaw did good this year ! Lol
customer_reviews.author: MusicCanhelpHeal

customer_reviews.title: Product nicely packaged and product came as described
customer_reviews.text: Product nicely packaged and product came as described. Product came with cable to charge. Product had a good fit to it. Only complaint was the headphones were a little to close together. But probably would have fit someone else's head. No problems with charging nor pairing. Product is good to go in my book
customer_reviews.author: JmVea

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to headphones/ear buds that keep you wsrm
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these as Christmas gifts. Everyone was thrilled. So far they have been used for cross country skiing, hiking and bike riding as well as general daily activities. No problems, warm, fit well and sound is greater
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beanie Hat Wireless Headphone
customer_reviews.text: Nice beanie hat with wireless headphones! Very cool product! Works well. Warm hat! Quick shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Had trouble pairing
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble pairing this product I contacted the support team and they walked me through getting it to pair now it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This beanie is great. Very confortable even for larger heads
customer_reviews.text: This beanie is great. Very confortable even for larger heads. The sound is pretty good but not noise canceling if you are curious. I work in a cold enviroment near forlifts. I need to stay warm but be very aware of my surroundings. Only complaints are the buttons on the beanie are covered with a leather looking cover and it has to be perfectly aligned with the actual buttons inside or you will skip a song instead of pausing it. Also the colors are black, gray and pink. Not red.
customer_reviews.author: AkWildGG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a friend that wears beanies all the time as a funny gift idea but those speakers can really pump out some sound! Still nervous about how to wash it but not disappointed in the slightest
customer_reviews.author: Jear

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband he has a 7 1/2 size head in hat size. While it is very very snug on his head these are perfect they are clear even when turned all the way up and hold a charge for atleast 5 hours, haven't had to have them on any longer. They don't get hot like some other brands when having them on to long. I have since then bought a different brand for him to fit his big head and have stolen these for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal call

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: They are warm, comfortable and the sound is amazing. As long as plan on sitting perfectly still when wearing, I highly recommend. However, as soon as you start to move, even walking, the earphones will slip off your ears and the top will slide down over your eyes. The banding needs to be much tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: This beanie works great! I'd recommend it as a gift to others. Sound quality is okay, but I wasn't expecting Beats headphone quality out of a beanie. No connectivity problems, I've had it for a few months and still going off the first charge. Easy to navigate between songs. I've gotten a lot of compliments on it. Oh, and the call feature was pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian D Hailey

customer_reviews.title: you can't fold the bottom up like you typically do with toboggan style hats because of ...
customer_reviews.text: This hat was ridiculously tall. I can't imagine how it would fit anyone. As I expected, you can't fold the bottom up like you typically do with toboggan style hats because of the control housing. But, even if I could have it still would have even been WAY too large. If you look at the photo provided, you can tell that it is supposed to bunch up a little and flop over, but on a real head it does way more than shown.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Steele

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift Ruined
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth won’t connect to my iPhone 8 Plus. I have another Bluetooth hat from a different company and it connects fine without a problem. This was intended for one of my 11 yr old daughters Christmas presents. Now with having to send it back for a replacement I don’t know if I’ll get it before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy E.

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: i bought this about 4 years ago and to this day they still work great. never had any issues.. still have and use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great musical hat
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My son’s girlfriend says too well. She says he can pretend to be listening to her but is really listening to the music.😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The speaker quality is quite good for the price of the hat (as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who is a college student. She absolutely loves it. The speaker quality is quite good for the price of the hat (as good as Apple earbuds in her opinion). No problems with bluetooth connection. Based on her enthusiasm, I have ordered one for myself for walking dogs, and gifts for others. Great gift for $40!
customer_reviews.author: Lee T

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had very long but so far so good. We'll see how long it kasts.
customer_reviews.author: PBaller

customer_reviews.title: I guess that can be a good thing though since unlike earbuds I know when it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my teenage son who is all about music. He loves it so far and has used it quite a bit. The only negative is that if he listens a bit too loudly I can hear the music too. I guess that can be a good thing though since unlike earbuds I know when it's too loud and can make him turn it down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this beanie and it’s good quality but just too big for my head and the earbuds don’t line up so it didn’t work for me. So I sent a request to return and was asked to gift to a friend but I wanted my money back so they said send it back with order number and all that other jazz and I sent it back and haven’t heard back from them or gotten my money back and it’s been close to a month. Won’t be buying anymore products from them
customer_reviews.author: Ean Bland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beanie, and the customer service! Will buy more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nic McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 13 year old son. He is so happy with the product. Keeps him warm on long runs and great Bluetooth connectivity. He was really pleased when the first call came in as he was running. He seamlessly answered the call and kept running - with great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband and he loves it. He can wear it in the car or on hikes, listen to music or have a phone conversation. I could not say if he has tried to wash it yet (lucky me, I don't have to do his laundry) but so far this turned out to be a great gift for him!
customer_reviews.author: Carisa McAllister

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: It’s 4 out of 5 because the blue label on the front is unattractive and stitched into the hat so it can’t be removed. Otherwise it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've been trying to find a good Bluetooth device to use for work, I am a parts delivery driver, & if i get a call from the store while I'm driving I can easily answer hands free while still looking cute & keeping my head warm. Unlike putting a normal hat over a bluetooth ear piece that muffles the microphone this one is clear to hear.
customer_reviews.author: lilmisszebra91

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. The receiver says he uses it everyday. Seems to have done what promised after about a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: William Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for techies
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandsons who thought this cap was very cool. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: msteven

customer_reviews.title: Has good sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it. It played loudly but other people can’t hear it. Great purchase! Just what I was looking for for him.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Fashion, no isolation
customer_reviews.text: So far so good Didnt workout yet but I look cool. Sound pretty good No isolation
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Genius!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for a Christmas gift for my snowboarding son and he absolutly loves it!! The order came in quickly and works perfectly. It paired easily and has very good sound! It is stretchy just like any knit beanie and fits my son without a problem. My son kept saying - this is genius! I would defenently recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Benita

customer_reviews.title: Works great with iPhones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, been using it for past few months now with no issues at all! Battery life is excellent too! I use it as a hands free to talk and listen to my music via my iPhone xs
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Well it works..
customer_reviews.text: The beanie does work. Sound quality is what you'd expect for a $20 pair of headphones... And as others have said, the left side is louder than the left, making it mildly annoying and definitely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Beanie Hat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Gift for our Son! He loved it and so did all his brothers!! Hope we can buy these Next Christmas!! Huge Hit!! Works Great!!
customer_reviews.author: EMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Love my new beanie
customer_reviews.text: Love my new beanie. No more dangling wires to get in the way, just music to my ears! Easy to operate. I don't mind the flashing blue light. Not only is it a very small light, when I have my beanie on I can't see the light, and I don't really care if anybody else does. It lets them know I've got something very cool (even though it's warm) on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy... bought it for my boys for Christmas and they loved it, so I bought it for myself for work
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good.
customer_reviews.text: It fits well for my son who has a ton of hair. The speaker has moved, though so that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Petsche

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me warm and connected
customer_reviews.text: I got this beanie for my cousin! He said it’s just perfect that it keeps him warm and he can also be free from holding the phone and doesn’t have to worry about dealing with headphone cords.
customer_reviews.author: Darrean Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Son and he really enjoys the blue tooth and listens to music while walking the dog.
customer_reviews.author: D. WesleyGoodwyn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son. So far the sound is great and the battery life is good. He says the hat is ompfy and he really likes it. The pairing was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leipzig

customer_reviews.title: They fit all three boys heads and they look great. One son is having an issue with pairing ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 hats for my three sons, ages 24, 17 and 16. They fit all three boys heads and they look great. One son is having an issue with pairing his iPhone, but the other two paired their iPhones just fine and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband, he's a mechanic and literally wore it to work all winter. The headphones come out for washing, and he says it works awesome. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, material meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he really likes it. However, I got it at Christmas and it already looks slightly ragged.
customer_reviews.author: chickenparmgirl

customer_reviews.title: totally awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: Love these things... great for winter outside activity. I wear this as my outer layer Under my biking helmet. have to run the iPod at half volume. pairs easily. bought some for each member of the family. hope they last
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this as a present for my friend and it turned out to be better than I thought. The sound is pretty clear and the volume level is reasonable. Not very loud but just loud enough. It's comfortable as well. The headphone controls are very convenient and the buttons work fine. It connected to my iPhone 6 quickly. My friend and everyone else that tried it loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased five of these for all my nephews. I ordered with time to spare before Christmas. However, some hats shipped, some didn't. two of them came a few days past Christmas. My son tells me the sound quality on these is just OK. The hat is well made and fits perfectly. A fun thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: California Gal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Super SMALL. Especially if you’re a female with hair. Speakers doesn’t even reach your ears. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jen li

customer_reviews.title: Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Gave as gift, so I can't comment on how well the worked long term, but the recipient said the beanie worked great right after he opened it
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Henry

customer_reviews.title: Beanie that is also Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my son. He had never seen one before and he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jean Denton

customer_reviews.title: Warm head & schizophrenia
customer_reviews.text: This hat is great at keeping my head warm but now I hear voices in my head, sometimes they just sing to me and sometimes they act like my mom leaving a voicemail. Doctors are baffled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Pairing is tricky because you need to get the right lights, but once paired sounds awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: The beanie is nice and soft, very comfortable and the pairing couldn't have gone any easier. They sound pretty good and it's nice that while paired, my phone displays how much power is left.
customer_reviews.author: wicc

customer_reviews.title: The regular size is perfect. I bought this for my son and he ...
customer_reviews.text: The regular size is perfect. I bought this for my son and he loves having the blue tooth in the hat. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity a BUST!
customer_reviews.text: The beanie was beautiful my son loved the look,but it kept loosing connection. He paired it with his phone , and the moment he put the beanie on his head, it lost connection every time. Now he just doesn't wear it, and it sits in the corner collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Has a good charge life, nice sound, and distance.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Agar

customer_reviews.title: Hats are good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Hat is the only gift I was thanked for last Christmas. I've owned several. Good for Light skying/boarding ! USB Micro Quality is the only flaw aside from the...nope; can't think of anything. This is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: This was for a dirty santa gift at our company Christmas party and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for a dirty santa gift at our company Christmas party and the person who got it loves it. He said he uses it every times he goes golfing. Big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great beanie!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I love this beanie! Bought it for my daughter and was pleasantly surprised at how well made this hat is!!! Nice and thick,so it is plenty warm enough. She said it is very comfy. The speakers are absolutely amazing! Clear and loud! I am very please with this product, and plan to buy another one. Price very nicely too!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He liked the idea of listening to his music
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beanie for my father-in-law because he works long hours out in the mountains. He liked the idea of listening to his music, but needed something wireless that would allow him to continue wearing a beanie since he works in below freezing temps. Needless to say, he loved it! Great quality and light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's ok not to impressed quality of material is good But not formed to the head beenie sags on top. Non adjustable one size does not fit all and the speakers don't fit snug to the head so the the volume needs to be turned all the way up unfortunately everyone can hear your music/volume of what ever your doing Sad thing is It was given as a gift and as much as I love all types of electronics I'm probably just going to regift it to someone else. Pity...
customer_reviews.author: Steven rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Was a gift for our 23 year old son. He has used it a few times and lives it.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Best Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon. The hat itself is nice but the Bluetooth capabilities are great. I can make calls and listen to music without having to hassle with cables or anything. I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Eischen - MagicFortune® Marketing

customer_reviews.title: Started great! Didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was going great until I had to charge it. The edge of the male end got caught on the edge of the female and and mutilated the charge port opening with little to no effort. It's now just an expensive beanie with speakers and wires.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: This hat is really a great thing to have
customer_reviews.text: This hat is really a great thing to have. Volume is good and connecting is a snap. I do experience some interference or short disconnects though at times. But all in all I would recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: gquatt

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Hat & Blu Tooth Too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hat for my son for Chanukah, & he loves it! Says the sound is great, & it’s stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

product_meta.title: Rotibox Bluetooth Beanie Hat Wireless Headphone for Outdoor Sports Xmas Gifts
feature_bullets: Style and Tech Combine: 100% Soft Acrylic,double knitted beanie,keep your head warm and allows you to listen to your music without having to wear additional headphones,the bluetooth stereo headset brings you great sound quality,style and comfort,perfect for gym,fitness,workout,exercise,outdoor sports such as running, skiing, snowboard, skating, hiking, camping, dog walking, holiday travelling and so on
The Latest Blutooth V4.1 Technology: Easy and fast to pair with cell phones, tablets and other Bluetooth enabled music devices,wireless range up to 33 feet

User-friendly Control Panel: The control panel built-in stereo speaker and microphone on the left earpiece allows you to skip back and forth through your playlist, answer and hang up calls without having to use your phone

Long-lasting Enjoyment of Music: Built in rechargeable Li-Ion battery,about 6 hours talking/playing time, 2.5 hours charging time,60 hours standby, so you have less time charging and more time doing.(USB charging cable included)
Fully Washable:One size fit most and washable after removing the headphones from the pouches
